Text: Me̩ ki ka ñw amo̩maye-me̩ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ kakini, Ammi;
Me̩ kobʼiye-me̩, kobʼo̩ ke—
tode̩gba kʼu nafʼu tago ofo,
Ochochi, omi ñʼali amo̩ma-wñ ejumomi n,
Todu iye-ma te̩tachʼajo̩ko̩;
Todule̩ go, omi anʼikeke kpʼo̩gba nyʼo̩na-wñ;
Tak owñ atʼame̩naja-wñ ubi,
Todu i ma ka kʼomi kʼe̩wñ e̩yo̩
Todule̩ omi adabi gbʼe̩wñ e̩yo̩-mi iko-wñ,
Fai tak u nakʼe̩wñ bʼe̩wñ ibe̩te̩-wñ te̩
Omi ñʼaje̩ ñw anyi-wñ du
Oñ nakpʼikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma-wñ kpʼoli o̩gbaikolo-wñ bie̩ rinyo̩,
Tak omi akʼiko ami Beal wa fejudʼo
Todule̩, go, omi agbʼo̩ ibe̩,
Tak u nakʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma-wñ ñw u o̩mo̩,
I la ade̩ iko le̩ Jihofa aka-i, kʼuwe̩ adomi ko̩ Ishi,
Todu omi akʼodu odu ami-Beal kwʼef alu-wñ, ma ñʼahi alu mʼodu-wñ ge̩ n.

Tak o̩jo̩ le̩ nakpʼalo̩ todu ma kpʼame̩wñ iñmi oko kpʼame̩we̩ ojale kpʼame̩wñ ki afa ane̩pe̩te̩; naño̩ fʼo̩o̩do̩ kpʼo̩kwo̩chageli kpʼo̩gu eja guche̩ kwo bʼoj ane̩-i te̩, oñ naje̩ ñw ma dachi añmi to̩ko̩o̩.
Tak omi adʼe̩ kpʼo̩la-mi o̩gbegbele̩; i-i, nadʼe̩ kpʼo̩la-mi ef o̩kpakpa kpai lʼo̩na kʼoji ajo̩ ka kpʼef ufe̩de̩nyo̩ kpʼef ejumomi.
Omi la adʼuwe̩ kpʼo̩la-mi kʼe̩ chʼe-mi kʼe̩ chubi mi tak uwe̩ ama Jihofa.
Tak i awache̩ iko le̩
tak ane̩ ile̩ adohi ñw e̩wñ e̩yo̩ kpʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma kpʼekpo,
tak omi adʼu gbe̩ ñw o̩la-mi oj ane̩-i.
